definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: TCCC must have the right to verify the copy with the inspecting company.
sentences.chinese: TCCC公司有權與審覈機構進行覈實報告的真實性。

sentences.english: Another is recognition of the truth of the Easterlin paradox.
sentences.chinese: 另外一項則是對伊斯特林悖論真實性的承認。

sentences.english: Another is his birthplace - some of the president's detractors question the veracity of Mr. Obama's Hawaiian birth certificate.
sentences.chinese: 一些詆譭者對他夏威夷出生證的真實性提出了質疑。

sentences.english: Nesw reality is important for net media's truth.
sentences.chinese: 把握好新聞的真實性，關係到網絡媒體的公信力。

sentences.english: I'm not doubting for a moment the sincerity of the couple's distress.
sentences.chinese: 曾有一段時間，我不再懷疑那對夫婦悲痛的真實性。

sentences.english: RESULTS The authenticity identification standard for the Synurus deltoides was ascertained.
sentences.chinese: 確定了山牛蒡真實性鑑定標準。

sentences.english: Some TV shows are full of exaggeration and lack trueness to life.
sentences.chinese: 現在的有些電視劇，情節夸誕，缺乏生活中的真實性。

sentences.english: Recognition of the Paraclete in the New Prophecy was their touchstone of authenticity.
sentences.chinese: 聖靈認識在新預言是其真實性的試金石。

sentences.english: On Intellects Prerequisite and Material Base of Moral Reason;
sentences.chinese: 沒有物質基礎，不具有真實性。

sentences.english: A digital signature stamps a proof of origin authenticity.
sentences.chinese: 數字簽名標誌原始的真實性的驗證。

sentences.english: I've read this report carefully and I can vouch for its truthfulness.
sentences.chinese: 我已仔細看過這份報告，我可以保證它的真實性。

sentences.english: The third section analyses and evaluates the facticity of the earnings.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是收益真實性的分析與評價。

sentences.english: That is the most direct and reliable way to establish its factualness.
sentences.chinese: 這是確證白宮真實性的最直接和最可靠的方法。

sentences.english: Based on its authenticity and aboriginality, archives can be used for the voucher with force.
sentences.chinese: 檔案在法律上的憑證作用基於它的原始性和真實性。

sentences.english: This evaluation pattern can raise the actuality of training evaluation efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 這一評估模式能夠有效地提高培訓評估的真實性。

sentences.english: Western diplomats confirmed that the annexe was authentic.
sentences.chinese: 西方外交人員確認了這份附件的真實性。

definition: to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
scope of authority/extent of power/(access etc) privileges
